alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 1:36PM AKST until November 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Skagway and the Klondike Highway. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Wednesday through Thursday event will be driven by a strong front advancing N through the area. Confidence in greater snow totals is highest for White Pass and the Klondike Highway and lower for Skagway. Snow totals could fluctuate considerably, as temperatures could prove warmer than anticipated should insufficient outflow be present.
info.instruction: Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
